A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was not what I was expecting or hoping for.  I am a Star Wars fan of 20+ years\, since I was a kid.  I am not blind to what is happening in our everyday lives in terms of progressive-minded people\, and for the most part\, I am in league with them.   That being said\, I feel like that way of thinking was taken too far\, and it's just a shame that it had to cheapen such a beloved franchise in the process
